nodes.text: Senator Streamdrinker was a Tynnan male who represented the planet of Tynna in the Galactic Senate and a member of the Delegation of 2000.

During the Clone Wars, Streamdrinker was elected as Senator to serve the Galactic Senate of the Republic. However, he was never able to gain experience in the Senate and had no idea what he was getting into. Due to Supreme Chancellor Palpatine's growing power, Streamdrinker grew suspicious over his act and called for his resignation. There, he joined the Delegation of 2000.

Shortly after the formation of the Galactic Empire, Streamdrinker and sixty-two other Senators of the Delegation (including Tanner Cadaman, Ivor Drake, Shea Sadashassa, Fang Zar and Grebleips) were arrested by the new Imperial Security Bureau.
The character of Streamdrinker was created especially for the HoloNet News article in Insider #84 by Dan Wallace—who admitted he made the character a Tynnan due to his fondness of the species.
